name: EdgeCode
description:
EdgeCode is an educational game in which you will learn about different coding or programming languages.

This game will show you "lessons" that will teach you about certain programming languages. After the "lesson",  you will be quizzed to see if you are really learning from those lessons. If you aren't able to get all of the questions correct, then you will have to take the lesson again until you get all of it correct.

This game is incomplete and is made for educational and research purposes

*This is also a renewed and better version of Codey,
